zh: 海绵吸水，所以很方便用来给水彩画等上阴影。

en: Please accept this little gift.
zh: 请收下这份小礼物。

en: There's the chance to get a huge income in this business, a million yen a month is possible!
zh: 这个生意有机会获得巨额收入，一个月赚一百万日元是有可能的！

en: It's a magnificent view, isn't it?
zh: 景色真壮观，不是吗？

en: "I'm just popping out on a date, OK?" "Come home by 7, Sakura!"
zh: “我出去约会一下，好吗？”“樱，7点之前回家！”

en: Sometimes my dog barks in the middle of the night.
zh: 有时候我的狗会在半夜吠叫。

en: It's a drama where you can enjoy the delicate workings of a woman's mind.
zh: 这是一部可以欣赏女性细腻心思的电视剧。

en: In the Edo period, moon-viewing parties were very popular.
zh: 在江户时代，赏月会非常受欢迎。

en: Will the universe expand indefinitely?
zh: 宇宙会无限膨胀吗？

en: The wedding ceremony will be held regardless of the weather.
zh: 婚礼将如期举行，无论天气如何。

en: They should go, regardless of whether they're men or women.
zh: 他们应该去，无论他们是男人还是女人。

en: This might not have anything to do with the problem at hand.
zh: 这可能和手头的问题没有任何关系。

en: Jealousy made him do that.
zh: 嫉妒使他那样做了。

en: When she was at university, Yuriko abandoned herself to sexual passion.
zh: 百合子在大学期间沉溺于性爱。

en: Sorry, that was none of my business.
zh: 对不起，这不关我的事。

en: Is that green striped shirt in the wash?
zh: 那件绿色的条纹衬衫在洗吗？

en: The "twin tiger cubs get separated ..." story felt a bit trite.
zh: “双虎幼崽失散...”的故事感觉有点老套。

en: Then, although it was dreary up to the other day, everywhere were flowers, flowers, flowers.
zh: 然后，虽然前几天还很阴沉，但到处都是花，花，花。

en: For dehydration, take a lick of salt.
zh: 为了防止脱水，舔一点盐。

en: "Who do you belong to?" Wrapped around his feet was a small cat. It was a fluffy grey striped cat.
zh: “你是谁家的孩子？” 一只小猫缠在他的脚边。那是一只毛茸茸的灰色条纹猫。

en: In connection with this I can only reply, "it is just as you say."
zh: 关于这件事，我只能回答，“正如你所说。”

en: A female beggar was begging with five or six children following along.
zh: 一个女乞丐带着五六个孩子在乞讨。

en: 'Needless to say' is often used as an idiomatic expression in the infinitive.
zh: “Needless to say” 经常以不定式的形式用作习语。

en: You should definitely ask him out.
zh: 你绝对应该约他出去。

en: It is a difficult task, choosing what is "right" or "wrong", but you have to do it.
zh: 选择什么是“对”或“错”是一项艰巨的任务，但你必须这样做。

en: It's difficult choosing between what's right and what's wrong, but you have to choose.
zh: 在对与错之间做出选择很难，但你必须做出选择。

en: It's difficult choosing between what's right and what's wrong, but you have to make the choice.
zh: 在对与错之间做出选择很难，但你必须做出选择。

en: How brave of you to go alone into the primaeval forest!
zh: 你独自一人进入原始森林，真是太勇敢了！

en: I'm instinctively bad with children and infants.
zh: 我本能地不擅长和儿童及婴儿相处。

en: Since it's not the rainy season, there's no need for an umbrella.
zh: 既然不是雨季，就没必要带伞。

en: We had a terrible time in the blizzard.
zh: 我们在暴风雪中度过了一段可怕的时光。

en: Last night it was Yumi who pushed for sex.
zh: 昨晚是由美主动要求发生性关系的。

en: 'Number-withheld' calls are scary, it's best not to answer them.
zh: 不显示号码的来电很可怕，最好不要接听。

en: When speaking about your superiors' actions, you use respectful language.
zh: 在谈论上级的行为时，要使用尊敬的语言。

en: I saw your name and posts in an English forum and took the liberty of reading your profile.
zh: 我在一个英语论坛上看到了你的名字和帖子，冒昧地阅读了你的个人资料。

en: It rains so often in the wet season that it's hard to plan outings.
zh: 在雨季，经常下雨，很难计划外出。

en: I don't have any clothes for when I go clothes shopping.
zh: 我去买衣服的时候，发现我没有衣服穿。

zh: 在某些操作系统上，文件名如果包含全角字符，会显示乱码，所以下载时请更改为合适的文件名。

zh: 自民党乘着小泉人气的浪潮。

en: With both mind and body in their best condition, let's look forward to the newcomers' training camp.
zh: 身心都处于最佳状态，让我们期待新人的训练营。

en: A molester is truly the enemy of women. I'll never let them get away with it.
zh: 色狼真是女性的敌人。我绝不会让他们逍遥法外。

en: This may be a silly question, but which is stronger - a tiger or a lion?
zh: 这可能是一个愚蠢的问题，但老虎和狮子哪个更强？

en: The chicken feed I get for a salary is good for nothing.
zh: 我那点儿工资，简直是鸡肋，食之无味，弃之可惜。

en: Even a rare guest wears out his welcome after three days.
zh: 再稀罕的客人，住上三天也让人厌烦。

en: The cops are keeping tabs on him.
zh: 警察正在监视他。

en: Can I have a few words with you?
zh: 我可以和你谈几句吗？

en: The recommendation from my boss made all the difference.

en: Please state your opinion crisply and clearly.
zh: 请你简洁明了地陈述你的观点。

en: It's hot, so you'd better head back quickly. Mackerel goes off so fast that they coined 'fresh-looking rotten fish'.
zh: 天热，你还是赶紧回去吧。鲐鱼不经放，所以才有了“鲜得快，烂得也快”的说法。

en: "I don't think she's an opponent you can ignore like that ..." "That's right, they say a cornered rat bites back, don't they?"

zh: 大不列颠是绅士和骑马的国度。

zh: 哎呀，快点儿。我们要迟到了！来，我帮你系鞋带。

en: Is there an English speaker here?

en: Samba is a Brazilian rhythm, isn't it?

en: I'm teaching basic participial constructions now, but, with regard to those below, what different ways of translating them would everybody use?
zh: 我现在教基本的分词结构，但是，关于下面的句子，大家会用哪些不同的方式来翻译它们呢？

en: Just because there aren't any complaints, doesn't necessarily mean your customers are content.
zh: 没有投诉，并不一定意味着你的客户满意。

zh: “我挺喜欢高处的。你知道，我上辈子一定是……一架飞机？”“通常这里应该说‘鸟’吧。”

en: When I try to listen to music with media player there's an error and I can't play the file.
zh: 当我尝试用媒体播放器听音乐时，出现错误，无法播放文件。

zh: 我个子矮，所以看不到架子顶上，所以基本上是靠触摸来除尘。

zh: 这个示例文本是一个写作指南的范例，因此请在使用前根据需要添加和删除内容。

zh: 显示器，又名监视器，是一种显示由计算机或类似设备产生的静态图像和移动图像的视频信号的设备。

en: Relative pronouns perform as 'conjunction + pronoun'.

en: What's different from Japan is that the doctors of Singapore generally all know each other.
zh: 与日本不同的是，新加坡的医生通常都互相认识。

zh: “...喂...喂，老师！”“诶？哦。”“你真的没事吗？你不应该取消课程吗？”

zh: 还过得去。没什么特别的。

zh: 把感冒传染给别人自己就好了，是真的吗？

zh: 我们的房子，我们的规矩。

zh: 另一方面，似乎有些年轻人，在接触佛教的同时，开始把它看作是一种重要的精神支柱。

zh: 如上所示，通过任何人都能做的真正简单的诀窍，就有可能获得充足的利润和客户！

zh: 大寒：这是一年中最冷的一天，但你也可以说春天就要来了。

en: If they can get both a forged card and its PIN then all the cash in the bank account will be withdrawn.
zh: 如果他们能同时获得伪造的卡和密码，那么银行账户里的所有现金都会被取走。

en: Yes, that is most certainly so.
zh: 是的，那当然是这样。

en: Eh? Hundreds of thousands of Yen plus betrothal gifts?
zh: 诶？几十万日元加上聘礼？

en: M-my goodness!? Cover-up! Cover yourself up!
zh: 天啊！？遮住！遮住你自己！

en: Eh? Have we run out of toner? Oh well, sorry, but can you go the staff-room and get some, Katou?
zh: 诶？没墨粉了吗？啊，不好意思，你能去员工休息室拿一些吗，加藤？

en: Thanks, please come again.
zh: 谢谢，欢迎再次光临。

zh: 我已经解除了我们的婚约。

en: It certainly feels smooth when you run the shaver over your skin.
zh: 用剃须刀刮过皮肤时，感觉确实很光滑。

en: Start, dammit!
zh: 启动，该死的！

en: How about wearing contact lenses?
zh: 戴隐形眼镜怎么样？

en: Saturday is the pottery class I've been attending since last year.
zh: 星期六是我从去年开始参加的陶艺课。

en: And so, Reiko, it's nothing for you to panic about.
zh: 所以，丽子，你没什么好恐慌的。

zh: 请把他们的名字写在他们带走的每件东西上。

zh: 但是只有一双筷子。我们该怎么办？

en: Hasn't it been solved yet? Whose responsibility is it, the prefecture's or the country's?

en: It's completely illogical. It wasn't as if I was shouting outside while drunk.
zh: 这完全不合逻辑。我又不是喝醉了在外面大喊大叫。

en: Even if it was somebody else who made her happy, as long as she is happy, that's fine.
zh: 即使是别人让她幸福，只要她幸福就好。

en: Only Takeuchi didn't accept the invitation.
zh: 只有竹内没有接受邀请。

en: However the protagonist is aware of his own mistakes.
zh: 然而主人公意识到了自己的错误。

en: There's no rush. If you would, in your own time.
zh: 不着急。如果你方便的话，在你自己的时间里。

en: "You with me?" "Yes"
zh: “你明白了吗？”“明白了。”

en: "Please check again." "Certainly."
zh: “请再确认一遍。”“好的。”

en: To be continued next time, and thus I most humbly request your attendance then.
zh: 下次再续，恳请各位届时出席。

zh: 赤道上每经度之间的距离。

en: Jeez, what're you up to?
zh: 哎呀，你在干什么呢？

en: It is sometimes acceptable to resort to violence.
zh: 有时诉诸暴力是可以接受的。

en: It's just like rats leaving a sinking ship.
zh: 这简直就像老鼠离开下沉的船。

zh: 他们看起来就像老鼠离开下沉的船。

en: They're just like rats leaving a sinking ship.
zh: 他们简直就像老鼠离开下沉的船。

zh: 我听说你可以用Windows XP刻录CD；你能告诉我一个解释相关步骤的网站吗？

en: How would you like your steak cooked?
zh: 你的牛排要几分熟？

en: If it was just a book the Space Police wouldn't be sticking their noses in. The problem is that it's a bundle of super technology.
zh: 如果只是一本书，太空警察就不会插手了。问题是它是一堆超级科技。

zh: 他不是那种喜欢听爵士乐的人。

en: I'm also in favour so it's three to one. And thus your objection is overruled.
zh: 我也赞成，所以是三比一。因此，你的反对无效。

en: Alright! They're all mopped up!
zh: 好！他们都被消灭了！

en: "Certainly if someone is _that_ beautiful you'd draw back from approaching her." "Thought you'd agree."
zh: “当然，如果有人_那么_漂亮，你就会退缩，不敢接近她。”“我就知道你会同意。”

zh: “啊，是...对不起，表哥。”“嘿！你可能是我亲戚，但在这里我是你的前辈和医生。在医院里要分清楚！”

zh: 这个网站在一个热门排行榜上。如果你觉得它有趣，请点击！

zh: 我扔掉一切来经营这家餐厅只有一个目的。

en: You can go skiing if you like, but for my part I prefer to stay at home and read a novel.
zh: 如果你喜欢，你可以去滑雪，但就我而言，我更喜欢呆在家里看小说。

zh: 而且，因为收垃圾的时间太早，所以很难在垃圾日把垃圾拿出去。

zh: 我歪着头。不是卒，而是马？

en: I moved a chess piece on the board one forward.

zh: 我就是不明白那些在论坛上捣乱的人脑子里在想什么。

en: The verb 'help' takes to-infinitives and bare infinitives but bare infinitives are said to be the most common in casual text; as also used in this example sentence.
zh: 动词'help'可以接带to的不定式和不带to的不定式，但是据说在非正式文本中最常见的是不带to的不定式；就像这个例句中使用的那样。

en: Please, by all means, drop in when you go shopping.
zh: 请务必在您购物时顺便来访。

en: Ah, unfortunately there is a small matter I need to attend to so I'll take my leave now.
zh: 啊，很遗憾，我有一件小事需要处理，所以我现在告辞了。

en: The tiger, having had its wounds treated, was returned by the villagers to the animal sanctuary without incident.
zh: 老虎在伤口得到治疗后，被村民们毫发无损地送回了动物保护区。

en: It takes a long time to convert.

en: That can't be good for your health, can it?

en: Anything like a road was covered with water that had flooded out of the river.

en: "Eh? Is the tangent cosine divided by sine?" "Other way round!"
zh: “诶？正切是余弦除以正弦吗？” “反过来啦！”

en: Actually, and I need to keep this quiet, but recently here there's a rumour that young women on this beach are having photos taken in secret of them.
zh: 实际上，我得小声点说，最近这里有个传言，说有人在偷偷拍摄这个海滩上年轻女性的照片。

en: I couldn't help overhearing, but you're police officers who handle cyber-crime or some such?
zh: 我不小心听到了，你们是处理网络犯罪之类的警察吗？

en: Then, those from a year ago won't be working any more!
zh: 那么，一年前的那些人就不能再工作了！

en: The future progressive tense is used when expressing events and action in progress at some future point, however the example sentence cannot be understood in that way.
zh: 将来进行时用于表达将来某个时刻正在进行的事件和动作，但是例句不能这样理解。

en: Well, shall we call it a day?
zh: 好吧，我们今天就到这儿吧？

en: I'd like to say a word of thanks to all those gentlemen and ladies whose care I have been in.
zh: 我想向所有照顾我的先生女士们表示感谢。

en: Isn't it a mild winter this year? Makes life easier.
zh: 今年冬天不是很暖和吗？生活也轻松多了。

en: "Lemme see your painting, Manaka." "Must you? It's embarrassing!"
zh: “让我看看你的画，真名。” “非要看吗？好难为情！”

en: Investing abroad on your national currency basis will not always be profitable.
zh: 以本国货币为基础在国外投资并不总是盈利的。

en: Omission is a perfectly good example of an expression technique, and is brought up in many grammar books.
zh: 省略是一种非常好的表达技巧的例子，许多语法书中都有提到。

en: I wonder if you can sue someone of the same sex for sexual harassment?
zh: 我想知道是否可以起诉同性进行性骚扰？

en: There's gum stuck to the back of my shoe.
zh: 我的鞋底粘了口香糖。

en: Is it the vacuum cleaner's fault that the room is dusty?
zh: 房间里有灰尘是吸尘器的错吗？

en: The flowers don't look happy. I'd like to water them. Is there a watering can?
zh: 这些花看起来不太好。我想给它们浇水。有浇水壶吗？

en: The flowers don't look well. I'd like to water them. Is there a watering can?
zh: 这些花看起来不太好。我想给它们浇水。有浇水壶吗？

en: This carving knife ... it's one made by a famous swordsmith.
zh: 这把雕刻刀……是著名刀匠制作的。

en: Recently there have been a lot of nasty incidents with fraud.
zh: 最近发生了很多恶劣的欺诈事件。

en: Recently there are a lot of young people who don't use respectful language to their superiors.
zh: 最近有很多年轻人对上级不使用敬语。

en: I also gave him a little something as a Christmas present the other day.
zh: 前几天我也给了他一点小东西作为圣诞礼物。

en: We're one baton short for the relay.
zh: 我们的接力棒少了一根。

en: Oh? You can type without looking at the keyboard. That's cool!
zh: 哦？你可以不看键盘打字。真酷！

en: "Well, there's something I'd like your advice on about my research project ..." "Let's see... Hmm, you're investigating flowering plants then."

en: "You don't get on well with your father?" "..." "Sorry, that was none of my business."
zh: “你和你父亲相处不好吗？”“……”“对不起，我不该问这个。”

en: "Let's head back." "Shall we drop by McDonald's?"
zh: “我们回去吧。”“要不要顺便去麦当劳？”

en: Karaoke, TV games, videos and a fridge ... love hotels nowadays really have everything.
zh: 卡拉OK、电视游戏、录像带，还有冰箱……现在的爱情旅馆真是应有尽有。

en: The novel I'm writing next is set in a love hotel so I wanted to see what one actually looks like.
zh: 我下一部小说是以爱情旅馆为背景的，所以我想看看它到底是什么样子的。

en: I wonder why tennis is played in mini-skirts.
zh: 我想知道为什么打网球要穿迷你裙。

en: I wonder why we play tennis in miniskirts.
zh: 我想知道为什么我们打网球要穿迷你裙。

en: Carbon monoxide is a poisonous substance formed by the incomplete combustion of carbon compounds.
zh: 一氧化碳是一种有毒物质，由碳化合物不完全燃烧形成。

en: To be a good child, you need to go to bed and get up early.
zh: 要成为一个好孩子，你需要早睡早起。

en: In my daily life I take care in various ways of my body so as not to damage my health.
zh: 在我的日常生活中，我以各种方式照顾我的身体，以免损害我的健康。

en: Ah, hold a mo. My shoelace's come undone.
zh: 啊，等一下。我的鞋带开了。

en: In the official question collection it is explained as being "passive voice of the present continuous tense".
zh: 在官方问题集中，它被解释为“现在进行时的被动语态”。

en: When night fell, she watched the moon.
zh: 夜幕降临，她望着月亮。

en: At night, she gazed at the moon.
zh: 晚上，她凝视着月亮。

en: "Aki's off school today?" "It seems her cold got worse."
zh: “阿纪今天不上学吗？”“好像她的感冒加重了。”

en: "It's pool-season from this week, isn't it?" "Oh yes. I've gotta go and buy a swimming suit, then."
zh: “从这周开始就是游泳池开放的季节了，不是吗？”“哦，是的。我得去买一套泳衣了。”

en: I have trouble taking powdered medicine.
zh: 我不擅长吃药粉。

en: You know this textbook is made of recycled paper.
zh: 你知道这本教科书是用再生纸做的。

en: You're really the best when, and only when, it comes to angering people.
zh: 你真的最擅长激怒别人，而且只有在激怒别人的时候才最擅长。

en: You know about 'ra-skipped words'? It looks like quite a lot of students are using mistaken words.
zh: 你知道“ら抜き言葉 (ra-skipped words)”吗？ 好像有很多学生都在使用错误的词语。

en: "What's up? Fidgeting like that" "Er, well, it looks like the elastic's gone in my pants."
zh: “怎么了？ 这么坐立不安的”“呃，那个，好像我裤子的松紧带断了。”

en: That fact becomes self evident if you take a look at the relation between this theme and those leading research on it.
zh: 如果你看看这个主题和那些关于它的领先研究之间的关系，这个事实就会变得不言而喻。

en: And so the method that works is treading down the snow to harden it, making blocks and piling them up.
zh: 所以有效的方法是踩实雪，使其变硬，然后制作成块并堆积起来。

en: If we're going to play, make your mind up about the rules!
zh: 如果我们要玩，就决定好规则！

en: It's difficult to tell which is which for burnable and non-burnable rubbish as well, isn't it?
zh: 可燃垃圾和不可燃垃圾也很难区分，不是吗？

en: Fudge! My stocking's run.
zh: 糟糕！我的长袜脱丝了。

en: If you mess-up it can't be redone, so don't mess-up!
zh: 一旦你搞砸了就无法重来，所以别搞砸了！

en: Anastrophe, by switching around words, has the effect of emphasizing text.
zh: 倒装，通过颠倒词语的顺序，可以达到强调文本的效果。

en: Today we will carry out an experiment about Ohm's Law.
zh: 今天我们将进行一个关于欧姆定律的实验。

en: That 'Ayumi' kid, only 13 but has performed in movies and theatres as a child actor since she was five.
zh: 那个叫'步'的孩子，才13岁，但从五岁起就作为儿童演员在电影和剧院表演了。

en: The grammar section includes the passive voice of the present perfect.
zh: 语法部分包括现在完成时的被动语态。

en: There are two ways of using the infinitive as an adjective, 1. attributive, 2. predicative. Naturally 2. is a subject complement.
zh: 不定式用作形容词有两种方式，1. 定语，2. 表语。自然地，2. 是主语补语。

en: Things that modify nouns (adjective, or adjectival equivalent).
zh: 修饰名词的东西（形容词，或相当于形容词的成分）。

en: You're having so much fun doing what you are that you can't see what's going on around you.
zh: 你太专注于你正在做的事情，以至于你看不见周围发生了什么。

en: I serve pub food to Canadian customers.
zh: 我向加拿大顾客提供酒吧食物。

en: As cultural exchange continued between the two countries, their mutual understanding became even deeper.
zh: 随着两国文化交流的不断进行，他们之间的相互理解变得更加深刻。

en: When a coil is moved near to a wire with current flowing in it current flows in the coil as well.
zh: 当一个线圈靠近一根有电流流过的导线时，线圈中也会产生电流。

en: It was going to be from Saturday, but, with one thing and another, it ended up being from the new week.
zh: 本来应该是从星期六开始的，但是因为这样那样的事情，结果是从新的一周开始。

en: I think you fall well within 'cute girl'. You'd easily go and pass in his judgement.
zh: 我认为你完全符合“可爱女孩”的标准。 你很容易通过他的评判。

en: Causing competitors to fail, obtaining confidential information, something that big business just can't do without - high risk but at the same time high return work.
zh: 导致竞争对手失败，获取机密信息，这是大企业离不开的——高风险但同时也是高回报的工作。

en: About four years ago my Achilles tendon started to hurt and I was told it was Achilles tendonitis.
zh: 大约四年前，我的跟腱开始疼痛，我被告知是跟腱炎。

en: Let's go to eat together.
zh: 我们一起去吃饭吧。

en: In the midst of the dollar falling hard against the Yen and other major Eastern currencies the Chinese Yuan, with China effectively taking a 'dollar peg' policy, has become cheap.
zh: 在美元对日元和其他主要东方货币大幅下跌之际，由于中国实际上采取了“美元挂钩”政策，人民币变得便宜了。

en: He has the capacity to be a future leader of the nation.
zh: 他有能力成为国家未来的领导人。

en: It is even becoming accepted even in exam-English that that called "simple future tense" does not exist.
zh: 即使在考试英语中，人们也逐渐接受了所谓“一般将来时”并不存在。

en: Tyrannical governments frequently gaol their political opponents.
zh: 专制政府经常监禁他们的政治对手。

en: Tyrannical governments frequently imprison their political opponents.
zh: 专制政府经常监禁他们的政治对手。

en: Tyrannical governments frequently put their political opponents in prison.
zh: 专制政府经常把他们的政治对手关进监狱。

en: Among the people of the colonies suffering under Earth's tyranny a force emerges intending to overthrow the status quo through terrorism.
zh: 在遭受地球暴政的殖民地人民中，出现了一股意图通过恐怖主义推翻现状的力量。

en: There are many uses of the 'present tense' of Japanese grammar which indicate things yet to happen.
zh: 日语语法的“现在时”有很多用法表示即将发生的事情。

en: Fuck you!
zh: 去你妈的！

en: Die!
zh: 去死！

en: Go to hell!
zh: 下地狱吧！

en: Language has, at the same time as being method of expressing one's thoughts, the side of being something used to think with.
zh: 语言在作为表达思想方式的同时，也具有思考工具的一面。

en: A light lunch at MacD's, coffee at Starbucks, then a few drinks with shabu-shabu - that's the way it went.
zh: 在麦当劳吃了顿简餐，在星巴克喝了咖啡，然后涮着火锅喝了几杯——事情就是这样发生的。

en: "You'll get your clothes dirty." "No worries. They weren't very clean in the first place."
zh: “你会把衣服弄脏的。”“没关系。反正它们一开始就不是很干净。”

en: Moreover, for your safety, we advise use of a substitute email address.
zh: 此外，为了您的安全，我们建议您使用备用电子邮件地址。

en: I switch on my laptop, start up the browser, and type in the address I've already learnt by heart.
zh: 我打开笔记本电脑，启动浏览器，然后输入我已经背得滚瓜烂熟的地址。

en: About today's packed-lunch, the menus prepared by Itsuki and Tanaka are low in beta-carotene-rich vegetables again aren't they?
zh: 关于今天的便当，树和田中准备的菜单中，富含β-胡萝卜素的蔬菜又很少了，不是吗？

en: I buy the texts, but first I start writing the English sentences that come along without looking at them.
zh: 我买了课本，但首先我不看课本，开始写随之而来的英语句子。

en: It's OK to think of 'five minutes' as a noun phrase, right?
zh: 把“五分钟”看作一个名词短语是可以的，对吧？

en: If she gets some antibiotics and sleeps, she'll get better.
zh: 如果她吃点抗生素然后睡一觉，她就会好起来的。

en: I'd like to set up a sign like, "This Way ->," but what would it be if I made it in English?
zh: 我想设置一个像“这边请 ->”这样的标志，但如果我用英语写，应该怎么写呢？

en: Thank you for your business. Please come again!
zh: 感谢您的惠顾，欢迎再次光临！

en: Gelatine has the property of setting as it cools.
zh: 明胶具有冷却后凝固的特性。

en: Along the way will be fine. It's a complicated matter.
zh: 顺路过去就行。这件事很复杂。

en: I've found something amazing!
zh: 我发现了一些惊人的东西！

en: In which case, I was also requested to invite all of you so if you would please accompany me...
zh: 在这种情况下，我也被要求邀请大家，所以如果可以的话，请和我一起去……

en: Whenever I go to a Japanese restaurant, I take the disposable chopsticks home with me.
zh: 每次我去日本餐馆，我都会把一次性筷子带回家。

en: Before adding a new sentence, please check that your sentence brings new vocabulary by searching the keywords.
zh: 在添加新句子之前，请通过搜索关键词来检查您的句子是否带来了新的词汇。

en: He chose the wrong man to pick a fight with.
zh: 他选错了人来挑衅。

en: Born on 2006 Feb 23, at 2730g, our family's treasure.
zh: 生于2006年2月23日，重2730克，我们家的宝贝。

en: You could at least try to be a bit more polite, even though it's not like you.
zh: 即使你不是那样的人，你至少可以试着更礼貌一点。

en: We've destroyed the enemy flagship!
zh: 我们摧毁了敌人的旗舰！

en: "Take a look at this." "Eh?" "There's an impact mark on the right-hand side of the bumper."
zh: “看看这个。”“嗯？”“保险杠的右侧有一个撞击痕迹。”

en: First, let us talk about the experiments conducted in laboratories.
zh: 首先，让我们谈谈在实验室进行的实验。
